metadata.title: CVE-2008-7315 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
UI-Dialog 1.09 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycommands.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2008-7315` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libui-dialog-perl - 1.21-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libui-dialog-perl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.21-0.1').
